verses.verse: Now in the first<WH259> year<WH8141> of Cyrus<WH3566> king<WH4428> of Persia,<WH6539> that the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> by the mouth<WH4480> <WH6310> of Jeremiah<WH3414> might be fulfilled,<WH3615> the LORD<WH3068> stirred up<WH5782> <WH853> the spirit<WH7307> of Cyrus<WH3566> king<WH4428> of Persia,<WH6539> that he made a proclamation<WH5674> <WH6963> throughout all<WH3605> his kingdom,<WH4438> and put it also<WH1571> in writing,<WH4385> saying,<WH559>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> Cyrus<WH3566> king<WH4428> of Persia,<WH6539> The LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of heaven<WH8064> hath given<WH5414> me all<WH3605> the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth;<WH776> and he<WH1931> hath charged<WH6485> <WH5921> me to build<WH1129> him a house<WH1004> at Jerusalem,<WH3389> which<WH834> is in Judah.<WH3063>

Who <WH4310> is there among you of all<WH4480> <WH3605> his people?<WH5971> his God<WH430> be<WH1961> with<WH5973> him, and let him go up<WH5927> to Jerusalem,<WH3389> which<WH834> is in Judah,<WH3063> and build<WH1129> <WH853> the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> (he<WH1931> is the God,)<WH430> which<WH834> is in Jerusalem.<WH3389>

And whosoever<WH3605> remaineth<WH7604> in any<WH4480> <WH3605> place<WH4725> where<WH834> he<WH1931> sojourneth,<WH1481> let the men<WH376> of his place<WH4725> help<WH5375> him with silver,<WH3701> and with gold,<WH2091> and with goods,<WH7399> and with beasts,<WH929> beside<WH5973> the freewill offering<WH5071> for the house<WH1004> of God<WH430> that<WH834> is in Jerusalem.<WH3389>

Then rose up<WH6965> the chief<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> of Judah<WH3063> and Benjamin,<WH1144> and the priests,<WH3548> and the Levites,<WH3881> with all<WH3605> them<WH853> whose spirit<WH7307> God<WH430> had raised,<WH5782> to go up<WH5927> to build<WH1129> <WH853> the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> which<WH834> is in Jerusalem.<WH3389>

And all<WH3605> they that were about<WH5439> them strengthened<WH2388> their hands<WH3027> with vessels<WH3627> of silver,<WH3701> with gold,<WH2091> with goods,<WH7399> and with beasts,<WH929> and with precious things,<WH4030> beside all<WH905> <WH5921> <WH3605> that was willingly offered.<WH5068>

Also Cyrus<WH3566> the king<WH4428> brought forth<WH3318> <WH853> the vessels<WH3627> of the house<WH1004> of the LORD,<WH3068> which<WH834> Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> had brought forth<WH3318> out of Jerusalem,<WH4480> <WH3389> and had put<WH5414> them in the house<WH1004> of his gods;<WH430>

Even those did Cyrus<WH3566> king<WH4428> of Persia<WH6539> bring forth<WH3318> by<WH5921> the hand<WH3027> of Mithredath<WH4990> the treasurer,<WH1489> and numbered<WH5608> them unto Sheshbazzar,<WH8339> the prince<WH5387> of Judah.<WH3063>
And this<WH428> is the number<WH4557> of them: thirty<WH7970> chargers<WH105> of gold,<WH2091> a thousand<WH505> chargers<WH105> of silver,<WH3701> nine<WH8672> and twenty<WH6242> knives,<WH4252>
Thirty <WH7970> basins<WH3713> of gold,<WH2091> silver<WH3701> basins<WH3713> of a second<WH4932> sort four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> and ten,<WH6235> and other<WH312> vessels<WH3627> a thousand.<WH505>

All <WH3605> the vessels<WH3627> of gold<WH2091> and of silver<WH3701> were five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred.<WH3967> All<WH3605> these did Sheshbazzar<WH8339> bring up<WH5927> with<WH5973> them of the captivity<WH1473> that were brought up<WH5927> from Babylon<WH4480> <WH894> unto Jerusalem.<WH3389>
